title: Work a Restocking Report
description: A system-generated report shows items on the sales floor that have fallen below their presentation minimum. An associate needs to restock them.

tasks.description: Generate or view the daily 'shelf replenishment' report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate gets a prioritized list of items that need restocking.

tasks.description: Go to the backroom and pick the items and quantities specified on the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate gathers all the needed stock.

tasks.description: Restock the items on the sales floor and mark the tasks as complete on the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: All low-stock items from the report are replenished on the shelves.
